# xmllint

## Configuration

| Variable | Description | Default value |
| ----------------- | -------------- | -------------- |
| VALIDATE_XML | Activate or deactivate xmllint | `true` |
| XML_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |  |
| XML_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |  |

## Behind the scenes

### Example calls

```shell
xmllint myfile.xml
```

### Application

- File extensions:
  - `.xml`
